## ButtonProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ButtonProps
```

## Properties

| Property                                                  | Modifiers | Type                           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [isDisabled?](./extensions.buttonprops.isdisabled.md)     |           | boolean                        | _(Optional)_ If <code>true</code>, the element is displayed in a disabled state.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [isProcessing?](./extensions.buttonprops.isprocessing.md) |           | boolean                        | _(Optional)_ If <code>true</code>, the element shows a processing indicator.                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [label?](./extensions.buttonprops.label.md)               |           | string                         | _(Optional)_ Text that is displayed inside button, i.e., the button label. If omitted, you must provide a <code>tooltip</code>.                                                                                                                                               |
| [onClick](./extensions.buttonprops.onclick.md)            |           | (event: MouseEvent) =&gt; void | Callback executed when the button is clicked.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [tooltip?](./extensions.buttonprops.tooltip.md)           |           | string                         | _(Optional)_ A tooltip text that is displayed when the element is hovered. Can be omitted if <code>label</code> is specified. Required if there is no <code>label</code> specified. For accessibility purposes, the tooltip is only displayed when it differs from the label. |
